adept.kbapi

Class KBSentiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.kbapi.KBPredicateArgument
      • adept.kbapi.KBRelation
        • adept.kbapi.KBMentalState
          • adept.kbapi.KBSentiment

  • public class KBSentiment
extends KBMentalState
    The Class KBSentiment represents a pointer to a Knowledge Base Entity uniquely identified by KB URI and source KB type.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  KBSentiment.InsertionBuilder
      Class for inserting a KBSentiment into the KB.
      class  KBSentiment.UpdateBuilder
      Class for updating the provenances or confidence of this sentiment.

      • sentimentInsertionBuilder

        public static KBSentiment.InsertionBuilder sentimentInsertionBuilder(adept.common.DocumentSentiment documentSentiment,
                                                                     Map<adept.common.Item,KBPredicateArgument> insertedArgumentMap,
                                                                     KBOntologyMap ontologyMap)
        Get a new insertion builder, copying information from the DocumentSentiment. All arguments of the sentiment must have already been inserted into the KB and be present in the insertedArgumentMap, which maps Document level argument targets to KB level argument targets. Provenances will be copied from the DocumentSentiment into the builder.
        Parameters:
        documentSentiment -
        insertedArgumentMap -
        ontologyMap -
        Returns:

      • updateBuilder

        public KBSentiment.UpdateBuilder updateBuilder()
        Get an updateBuilder for this KBSentiment. Provenances and the confidence may be updated.
        Overrides:
        updateBuilder in class KBRelation
        Returns:
